summary: We're excited to introduce the new and improved Edge Rules for Bunny CDN.  The update brings an improved interface, multi-action rule support, and new actions and triggers.  We've made Edge Rules not only easier to set up but also more powerful

summary:
I was listening to a podcast where the author Ray Bradbury was mentioned.  It was revealed that he had a note above his typewriter that said, “Don't think”. 
He explained that as a creative person, it's more about feeling and less about thinking...
title: Don't think
